abilityEffect.en: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Electrode is your Active Pokémon, you may flip a coin. If heads, choose a [L] Energy card from your discard pile and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. This power can't be used if Electrode is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.
